title: When the toxic yasuo says your trash but you say "no u"

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Xedlord,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=H15NfA9h,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-07-10T14:37:15.391+0000)
>
> *You're

No, I'm pretty sure the toxic Yasuo says "your trash."
Ahh yes, whenever someone calls me trash I just do a “no u” on them and they don’t respond

> [{quoted}](name=Polaris I,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=H15NfA9h,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-10T13:27:15.333+0000)
>
> Ahh yes, whenever someone calls me trash I just do a “no u” on them and they don’t respond

 No u
just correct every grammatical error they make. "your trash" "you're*" works like a charm to Tilt the Yasuo(tm)
more like a curse because he will proceed to int even more and what not
To be honest i just remind them they are playing a champion who is a crutch for propping up bad gameplay.

I don't respond, and then this makes them crumble into oblivion. Usually, they try to spam pings to get my attention, but then they sorta wilt when I mute everything. What also happens is you get to see them stop moving or attacking to try to type something out to you, but sweet sweet silence reaches your ears.
